llmware-ai/llmware

Python toolkit for building LLM and RAG apps with lots of small, specialized models

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • curated list of tools and frameworks for building LLM apps
  • curated list of LLM libraries and tools for engineers
  • lightweight Python library for building RAG pipelines with LLM and document retrieval support
  • multi-agent framework for building LLM-powered Python apps
  • build AI agents in Python with Pydantic, supports multiple LLMs
  • Open-source LLMOps platform for building and managing LLM apps
  • toolkit for evaluating and optimizing LLM and RAG apps
  • framework for building LLM and RAG apps with pipelines
  • Python toolkit for running LLMs on sensitive documents locally or via cloud, supports Ollama, OpenAI, Anthropic, with RAG and document intelligence features
  • builds Python chat UIs for LLM apps with custom logic
